title: Did Notre Dame Colleagues Ask Barrett to ‘Halt’ Supreme Court Nomination Process?
subtitle: Amy Coney Barrett's nomination to the U.S. Supreme Court came less than a week after the death of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: An open letter written by dozens of Notre Dame colleagues of Judge Amy Coney Barrett, U.S. President Donald Trump’s Supreme Court nominee, requested that she “halt [the] nomination process” until after the election.
